name: Warden City
description:
Gameplay

Warden City is a puzzle game where your goal is to create roads to allow different types of vehicule to reach their destination.

Features

  • Play default campaign maps created by us who will also serve as tutorial
  • Create your own maps and share them on the builtin store
  • There are different roads allowing you to design the path you imagine
  • You can upgrade and sell roads who might be already in place

Default Controls (Mouse & Keyboard) Every key can be changed

  • Select Block : Mouse1 (Left Click)
  • Edit Block : R
  • Delete Block : Delete
  • Move Block : M
  • Rotate Block : Mouse2 (Scroll Click)
  • Rotate Camera Right : D
  • Rotate Camera Left : Q

Project Status

Our project just reached Beta and we are looking for feedback will we continue our development..

Credits & Contact

You can checkout our whole team and contact us on our website or just leave a comment on this page for any feedback.
